snippet: An army offensive against Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula killed at least 42 people on Wednesday and sent residents fleeing.
abstract: Fighting between soldiers and militants in southern Yemen kills at least 42 people and sends residents fleeing; comes amid an army offensive against Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula.
lead_paragraph: An army offensive against Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula killed at least 42 people on Wednesday and sent residents fleeing.

headline.main: Yemen: Dozens Are Killed in Fighting in the South
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Dozens Are Killed in Fighting in the South

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
